meanings.definition: Cobaltines: relating to or resembling cobalt
meanings.sent1: The cobaltines sky was so beautiful.
meanings.sent2: She painted her room in a lovely cobaltines color.
meanings.sent3: The cobaltines flowers in the garden seemed to glow.
meanings.sent4: His eyes sparkled like cobaltines gems.
meanings.sent5: The cobaltines dress shimmered under the lights.

meanings.sent1: The artist used cobaltines to paint the ocean.

meanings.sent5: The cobaltines of the sea was mesmerizing under the sun.

meanings.definition: Cobaltines: a type of mineral containing cobalt
meanings.sent1: Miners discovered cobaltines deep in the cave.
